sections.content:
**How The Side Hustle/Client Acquisition Campus Works **

The Client Acquisition Campus covers: 
>  - Building social media 
>  - Getting clients
>  - Building a team 
>  - Side hustles 

While you are learning a skill you will show up daily in The Client Acquisition Campus to learn to build your social media, sell your service (skill), and build your team. 

If you want to make money quickly, start with the Side Hustle category found above.

**Where Can You Learn a Skill?**

**Affiliate Marketing Campus**
> - YouTube and Tiktok growth 
> - building Telegram channels

**Content Creation + AI Campus ** (Coming Soon)
> - CC + AI covers video editing
> - content creation
> - AI (artificial intelligence)

**Business Mastery **
> - sales

**Client Acquisition Campus**
> - Side hustles
> - Getting a little bit into copy

Either head to one of these campuses if you have already added it or head to the "Campus Selection" channel to add a new campus. 

Additionally, if you already have a skill I will teach you how to get clients and build a team.
